iting

W=
ell, most importantly, make the JSPs contains as few logic as possible. Put=

as much of the logic as possible into POJOs and/or taglibs, and test those=

the usual way.

If you really need to test the JSPs, you can use jWebUnit =
with ServletUnit
as the test container (the latter comes with httpUnit), or=
 Jetty as an
embedded webserver.

I'd only decide to use cactus if I really=
 needed to test inside the
production server; cactus is powerfull, but also=
 the most complex and
slowest solution.
